name: ElectriCITY
description:
BEST PLAYED WITH A FRIEND!
Turn off the light. Sounds easy right? Well add in a ticking timer, some powerups and a friend whos trying to beat you to it, and you've got yourself a challenge. The goal is simple, turn off more lights than the other player to win all while trying not to get bounced up or thrown off the side of the map. It's a lot more fun than you think, I promise you.

Controls are as follows: 

WASD and Space bar for Blue player (p1) 

Arrow keys and (return, Left ctrl, or Numpad Enter) for Red player (p2)

Controller controls are left joystick for movement, A to jump and Right bumper to Turn off lights/pick up powerups

Get ready for a fast paced hilarious adventure to turn off the lights!

Good Luck and Have fun, Leave any bugs in the Comment section!

Best if played in Full screen with sound!
